title: Five-Star New Jersey Beachfront Retreat with Poolside Restaurant & Bar
description: Find coastal bliss just over an hour away from Manhatten at the Asbury Ocean Club Hotel in New Jersey. Set in the historic shore town of Asbury Park, this beachside retreat combines beachfront living with pure indulgence. Savour locally sourced cuisine at The Drawing Room restaurant, unwind at the spa, explore the Asbury boardwalk or simply relax in your elegant suite: whatever your choice, the Asbury Ocean Club Hotel has you covered.
offer_address: 1101 Ocean Avenue, Asbury Park, New Jersey 07712, United States
